question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/oracle_queue_init_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Validation Incomplete] Does validate() only check 3 conditions (version, min_attestations>0, oracle_validity_length_ms>0) but miss critical validations like queue_key format, authority validity, or fee reasonableness? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/oracle_queue_init_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Validation Guardian Queue Consistency] Does validate() check that guardian_queue is actually shared and accessible, or can attacker pass a guardian_queue that will be deleted before actuate() uses its ID? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/oracle_queue_init_action.move] [Function: run()] [Cross-Module Reentrancy] Can calling queue::new() at line 43 trigger a callback to attacker-controlled code before actuate() completes, allowing attacker to manipulate queue state before event emission? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/oracle_queue_init_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Non-Atomic Queue Creation] If queue::new() shares the object and then returns, can another transaction access the queue before OracleQueueCreated event is emitted, creating race condition? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/oracle_queue_init_action.move] [Function: run()] [Multiple Queue Creation] Since run() is public entry, can an attacker call it multiple times in parallel with same parameters, creating multiple queues with identical configuration causing confusion? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/oracle_queue_init_action.move] [Function: run()] [Gas Exhaustion] Can an attacker pass extremely large queue_key or name parameters that cause run() to exceed gas limits during queue::new() storage allocation, griefing legitimate queue creation? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/oracle_queue_init_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Event Emission Cost] If queue_key is 10MB, does emitting it in OracleQueueCreated event at line 60 cause excessive gas costs or event size limits, failing the transaction?
